Package moteur

Class PlayerVirtuel

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Observable
      • moteur.Player
        • moteur.PlayerVirtuel
  • public class PlayerVirtuel
extends Player
    The class PlayerVirtual is also a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerVirtual will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.

    Plus, a PlayerVirtual acts differnetly in comparison to a real human, all the decisions of choosing cards should be made by the algorithms. So two methodes chooseOneFaceup() and chooseSomeonesOffer.

    See Also:
    Player, PlayerReel

    • Method Detail

      • chooseOneFaceup

        public void chooseOneFaceup()
        This algorithm will be called when it's the player's trun to choose one card faced up, just after each turn, deal cards to every player. Typical implementation of the D.P. Strategy.
        Specified by:
        chooseOneFaceup in class Player

      • chooseSomeonesOffer

        public void chooseSomeonesOffer()
        This algorithm will be called when it's the player's turn to choose the offer form another player. Typical implementation of the D.P. Strategy.
        Specified by:
        chooseSomeonesOffer in class Player
